name: Stick Z: Super Dragon Fight
description:
Stick Z: Super Dragon Fight - The best 2019 action game on Apple Store.
In this game, you will play Stickman Z to fight against enormous Dragon bosses, the most dangerous enemy in the universe. Through each level, your enemies will upgrade their power, which makes the game stay challenging and exciting, and also not easy to win.

It could be one or even several enemies at the same time for you to beat. On the other hand, Super Stickman Z has a much different power level to choose for upgrading.
We bet you will be in love with this addictive game right away.

Collect coins on each level completed and use them to get the strongest stick warriors to your team.

******************** FEATURES ********************

• Easy to play the game and Easy to control.

• 20 Super stick levels with amazing graphics.

• 50+ bosses with 100+ skills.

• Many challenges each level

• Many characters to collect and upgrade.

Download game for free on Apple Store right now!
developers: MOBIONE TELECOMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY AND SERVICE CO
publishers: MOBIONE TELECOMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY AND SERVICE CO
